about_the_game:
STORY


In an Earth ravaged by a nuclear conflict, humanity struggles to rebuild in the year 333 A.C. Emerging from the aftermath, the "Free World Alliance" (FWA) imposes order while suppressing dissenting factions seeking independence. Amidst rising tensions, the "Iron Dawn" rebels harness repurposed Mobile Frames as deadly Mechs, challenging the FWA's dominance.

As skirmishes escalate in 332 A.C., the Iron Dawn gains traction, prompting the FWA to counter with their own Mechs. With support swelling for the Iron Dawn, their sights are set on overthrowing the FWA and invading Valeria. In the throes of full-scale warfare in 333 A.C., you step into the role of a captain within the "Ghost Squad," the 7th Mech division of the Iron Dawn.

As part of the Ghost Squad, your mission is pivotal: infiltrate enemy territory, sow chaos, and weaken defenses. Your strategic actions hold the key to the success of the division's assault against the FWA. Join the Iron Dawn, lead your squad in disrupting enemy forces, and become the linchpin in a crucial assault that will determine the fate of a war-torn world.

LEAD THE SQUAD TO VICTORY


Lead the Ghost Squad in piloting over 25 Mechs, each equipped with diverse arsenals inspired by the Iron Dawn's struggle. Engage in varied missions, leveraging these powerful machines to pave the path to victory against the oppressive forces of the Free World Alliance.


ENVIRONMENTAL HAVOC UNLEASHED


Engage with a fully destructible environment, tactically leveraging it to gain an edge. Witness the spectacle as crumbling surroundings accentuate the might of your Mechs, intensifying the thrill and empowerment of each encounter.



FEATURES


  • Unlock 25 Mechs, 40 weapons, and 20 pilots with different behavior.
  • 100% destructible environment.
  • Random variation maps and missions or Roguelite element.
  • Rich war story

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: i3-6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Super, newer is better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Join the Iron Dawn, pilot powerful Mechs, and wage intense top-down battles against an oppressive regime. Engage in fast-paced, destructive combat, and lead the charge in liberating a war-torn world through force.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Thai, Vietnamese, Filipino
*languages with full audio support
